greet: 👋 Hi {mention} and welcome to HackVita Status. 🧠 This unofficial Bot will show you the current and past status for all the HackVita.eu services. ⚜️ Services Status: 🌐 • Website: {website_status} 🐝 • APIs: {api_status} ✏️ • API Docs: {api_docs_status} 🔑 • Internal APIs: {internal_api_status}
credits: ‍💻 Bot developed by @alsoGAMER in Python {python_version} and BotBase {botbase_version} ⚙️ Version: {bot_version} ❤️ Special thanks to: • Giovanni and the whole HackVita Team for the fantastic job done with this Generator (and also for letting me do this Bot). • Lorena for helping me out with all the Bot messages and styling. • Davide for helping me out troubleshooting various Bot functions. • Fede for all the moral support given to me in the development phase. 🐈 GitHub Repo: Click Here
flood_notice: 🤙 Hey buddy! 🕐 Relax! You have been banned for {time} minutes
marked_busy: 🎲 You're now busy, resend /busy to reset this state
unmarked_busy: ✍ You'll now receive support requests again
support_request_sent: ✅ You're now in the queue, wait for an admin to answer you 🔄 Admins available {queue} Updated on: {date} Note: If there are no admins available at the moment, press the 'Update' button every now and then to find out if a seat is available!
user_info_unchanged: ❌ I haven't detected any changes for this user
id_missing: The selected ID ({tg_id}) isn't in the database
name_missing: The selected username ({tg_uname}) isn't in the database
bot_disclaimer_text: ❕ DISCLAIMER 🧠 Please keep in mind that even this Bot is UNOFFICIAL, it will grab the status from an Official source. ✅ So the data reported here is 100% reliable.
services_status_history_text: 📓 Status History — 30-days Average 🌘 🌐 • Website: {website_30d_avg}% Uptime {website_30d_avg_symbol} 🐝 • APIs: {api_30d_avg}% Uptime {api_30d_avg_symbol} ✏️ • API Docs: {docs_30d_avg}% Uptime {docs_30d_avg_symbol} 🔑 • Internal APIs: {internal_api_30d_avg}% Uptime {internal_api_30d_avg_symbol} — 90-days Average 🌗 🌐 • Website: {website_90d_avg}% Uptime {website_90d_avg_symbol} 🐝 • APIs: {api_90d_avg}% Uptime {api_90d_avg_symbol} ✏️ • API Docs: {docs_90d_avg}% Uptime {docs_90d_avg_symbol} 🔑 • Internal APIs: {internal_api_90d_avg}% Uptime {internal_api_90d_avg_symbol}
